Package dkeep.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    Character - abstract class that represent both the hero and enemies; extends the Entity class
    Club
    Club - extends the GameObject class
    Door
    Door - extends the GameObject class
    DrunkenGuard
    DrunkenGuard - extends the Guard class
    Entity
    Entity - abstract class that holds information about common to objects and characters alike
    FreeCell
    FreeCell - class that represents an "empty" space in the layout; extends the GameObject class
    GameObject
    GameObject - class that represents all the objects in the game (door, key, lever, ...); extends the Entity class
    GameState
    GameState - class that represents a game session; holds all the essential information (levels, current level, ...)
    Guard
    Guard - extends the Character class
    Hero
    Hero - extends the Character class
    Key
    Key - extends the GameObject class
    Level
    Level- class that holds all the information regarding a level (layout, objects, enemies, ...)
    Lever
    Lever - extends the GameObject class
    Ogre
    Ogre - extends the Character class
    RookieGuard
    RookieGuard - extends the Guard class
    SuspiciousGuard
    SuspiciousGuard - extends the Guard class
    Wall
    Wall - extends the GameObject class
